description:
Revive your once-waterproof garments. Regular maintenance helps waterproof-breathable fabrics work their best. When water stops beading up and starts soaking in, this spray-on waterproofer restores the DWR finish in your gear.

  • Helps maximize both water repellency and breathability
  • PFAS-free formula
  • Suitable for use on all GORE-TEX®, eVent and other wateproof-breathable fabrics
  • For best results, spray directly onto a freshly washed, damp garment from 15cm. Remove any excess drips with a clean cloth. Hang to dry or follow drying instructions on the garment's care label
  • 100% recycled container is made from post consumer plastic and ocean plastic
  • Bluesign® approved product
name: Grangers Performance Repel Plus Spray 275ml
